data.message:
Love ya bro but cmon dude, buy everyone a pair of shoes that needs em from hurricane lol
Auctioning old pair of kicks? Really?

replies.message: Maybe it's the idea that someone would cherish those shoes simply because they were from him...
Somebody always gonna hate on somethin... had he not posted thus, u wouldnt have talked about him donatin shit lol
You dont know shit about shoes. When they came out they sold for over 10k a pair.
What are you doin' to help out, Dan Spangler? You kickin' in your own money, then auctioning off merch to help even more? Lemme know how your efforts have gone before you demean Em's efforts.

And $10,000 from millions equals......lame. lol
I'm a huge fan. Have been since before he made it. Just saying.......all these rich movie stars/musicians doing fund raising tossing out pennies. Lol
I am very generous with my money Ward. Help any and all I can.......that's why it's a joke watching millionaires do nothing.

You think he's done nothing? He's already personally donated, look it up.  While you're at it, check out how he donated after the attacks in Paris.  And then check the 6+ charities that he's got started up & donates to.

And you really think it's gonna be a single pair of shoes? Look, he doesn't HAVE to do anything, Dan.  He has no contract that says he had to give back. He does this cuz he knows better than most what it's like to have nothin'.

And the only joke I see is you sayin' that you love & respect this guy but don't know of the good that he does.

If you wanna take shots at millionaires not doin' enough, there's literally almost an endless supply to choose from, but not Em.

As for me, you got way more of my time and attention than I wanted to give.  Ciao.
You'd rather him buy them shoes than match donations up to 250K? Are you stupid on purpose or does it just come naturally at this point?

Potentially raising 500,000 (half of his own) plus giving away the 15,000$ shoes. But nah buy shoes causes that's what they're really wanting right now. I mean a quarter million is a good bit of money to be throwing around to people you don't even know.
It's not his trainers are you that gulable to believe this post is real
i don't believe this is all he's done or you wouldn't even be hearing or seeing it don't believe everything you see on Facebook or internet
These are the Eminem 4s They resell around 15k. Educate yourself before hating.
